item.title: Main Tanks 2 and 3 Override/Jettison Pumps – Generator Systems Operative

remarks.para: One forward or aft override/jettison pump may be inoperative deactivated provided, for an aft override/jettison pump, all engine driven generator systems are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

To preclude possibility of fuel imbalance between main tanks 2 and 3 when only one override/jettison pump is operative, it is recommended that an override/jettison pump in the symmetrical main tank be selected OFF. If an operative pump is selected OFF, it may be selected ON should the crew desire to minimize time required to jettison fuel.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to fuel jettison module in the cockpit: "#2 or #3 MAIN OVRD/JETT PUMP INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MAIN TANKS 2 AND 3 OVERRIDE/JETTISON PUMPS
maintenance.para: Deactivate the inoperative fuel pump(s) by opening and collaring the appropriate circuit breaker(s):

numlitem.para: Tank 2 FWD override/jettison pump: P414 PANEL, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP FWD 2.
Tank 2 AFT override/jettison pump: P415 PANEL, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP AFT 2.
Tank 3 FWD override/jettison pump: P414 PANEL, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP FWD 3.
Tank 3 AFT override/jettison pump: P415 PANEL, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP AFT 3.
